aws_db_option_group.description: Provides an RDS DB option group resource.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`. Must be lowercase, to match as it is stored in AWS.

option_group_description.description: The description of the option group. Defaults to "Managed by Terraform".

engine_name.description: Specifies the name of the engine that this option group should be associated with.

major_engine_version.description: Specifies the major version of the engine that this option group should be associated with.

option.description: A list of Options to apply.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

option_name.description: The Name of the Option (e.g. MEMCACHED).

option_settings.description: A list of option settings to apply.

port.description: The Port number when connecting to the Option (e.g. 11211).

db_security_group_memberships.description: A list of DB Security Groups for which the option is enabled.

vpc_security_group_memberships.description: A list of VPC Security Groups for which the option is enabled.

arn.description: The ARN of the db option group.
